channel.title: Comments on: Chocolate Panna cotta with Florentine Cookies – Daring Bakers Challenge February 2011

item.title: By: sweetlife
item.dc:creator: sweetlife
item.description:
I love the look of the choclate behind the blue, a perfect presentation!!
sweetlife
item.content:encoded:
I love the look of the choclate behind the blue, a perfect presentation!!

sweetlife

item.title: By: Simona
item.dc:creator: Simona
item.description: I like the glasses you chose to serve the panna cotta. The whole presentation looks very elegant. I think chocolate will be my next try in the panna cotta department. Very nice job!
item.content:encoded: I like the glasses you chose to serve the panna cotta. The whole presentation looks very elegant. I think chocolate will be my next try in the panna cotta department. Very nice job!

item.title: By: Cheeky Chops
item.dc:creator: Cheeky Chops
item.description: Gives me a great idea for a vegetarian version. Looks to have come out very well. I wish we had something similar to the Baker's Challenge in London!
item.content:encoded: Gives me a great idea for a vegetarian version. Looks to have come out very well. I wish we had something similar to the Baker’s Challenge in London!

item.title: By: Michelle
item.dc:creator: Michelle
item.description: I too enjoyed the chocolate panna cotta. Yours are beautiful and I'm loving your florentines! So pretty!
item.content:encoded: I too enjoyed the chocolate panna cotta. Yours are beautiful and I’m loving your florentines! So pretty!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: The chocolate panna cotta looks beautiful, and I love the different shaped florentines. Excellent job on this challenge!
item.content:encoded: The chocolate panna cotta looks beautiful, and I love the different shaped florentines. Excellent job on this challenge!

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: You panna cotta and cookies look great! I also love the vanilla one you made previously, great shape. Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: You panna cotta and cookies look great! I also love the vanilla one you made previously, great shape. Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: The chocolate panna cotta looks very elegant in the glass, and in your earlier post, the turned out panna cotta looked very cool. Very funny about how the turned out panna cotta look suggestive.
item.content:encoded: The chocolate panna cotta looks very elegant in the glass, and in your earlier post, the turned out panna cotta looked very cool. Very funny about how the turned out panna cotta look suggestive.

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Wonderful job! Your panna cotta looks great in the cocktail glasses! I like how you drizzled the chocolate over the cookies instead of making sandwiches!
item.content:encoded: Wonderful job! Your panna cotta looks great in the cocktail glasses! I like how you drizzled the chocolate over the cookies instead of making sandwiches!

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: Beautiful presentation Anita - a very elegant dessert.
item.content:encoded: Beautiful presentation Anita – a very elegant dessert.

item.title: By: muppy
item.dc:creator: muppy
item.description: Looks delicious! I like the sound of chocolate panna cotta.
item.content:encoded: Looks delicious! I like the sound of chocolate panna cotta.
